CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.2.2.1b, gestationperiodunit (3N)
E2B (R3): D.2.2.1b Gestation Period When Reaction/Event Was Observed in the Foetus (unit) Conformance: Optional, but required if D.2.2.1a is populated. Data Type: 50AN OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.989.2.1.1.26 Value Allowed: UCUM codes for Month, Week, and Day:{Trimester}
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Gestation period when reaction or event was observed in the fetus.
CustomField.label: Patient Gestation Period Unit
